```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DataExplorer)
```

```{r}
raw <- readxl::read_xlsx("data/finaldataforanalysis3.xlsx")

glimpse(raw)
```

```{r}
tbl <- raw %>%
    mutate(
        count_Asphyxia_cat = factor(
            count_Asphyxia,
            ordered = TRUE,
            levels = c(0,1,2,3,4,5,6)
        )
    )

summary(tbl$count_Asphyxia_cat)
```

```{r}
plot_intro(tbl)
```
